name: pokemon-explorer
description: Pokemon Explorer - A full-stack application for browsing and managing Pokemon with teams and favorites

scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:studio: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma studio
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Modinity Team
